name: INStartWorkoutIntent
desc: A request to start a workout for the user.

items.name: init(workoutName: INSpeakableString?, goalValue: Double?, workoutGoalUnitType: INWorkoutGoalUnitType, workoutLocationType: INWorkoutLocationType, isOpenEnded: Bool?)
items.desc: Initializes an intent object with the specified workout information.

items.name: var goalValue: Double?
items.desc: The user-supplied numerical goal of the workout.

items.name: var workoutGoalUnitType: INWorkoutGoalUnitType
items.desc: The units associated with the workout goal.

items.name: var isOpenEnded: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the workout is open ended.
